ygData.subject: Re: TWINKING-- a discussion
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the opinion!! I really think I agree with you. I lean more towards no twinking. Here s a kinda similar situation-- as a caster, I was in a group
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the opinion!! I really think I agree
with you. I lean more towards no twinking. Here's a
kinda similar situation-- as a caster, I was in a group
that was a few levels higher than me, taking on MOBs
much higher than me in Unrest. I could NOT hit a damn
thing with my spells-- constantly resisted. It made me
pretty much worthless in that group. While I was
initially angry, i realized that it, in a way, prevented me
from "experience twinking" -- just like how EQ doesn't
let you get experience being in very high groups. I
wondered if they could do that with armor/weapons. I mean,
I can't twink and get lvl 30 spells at lvl 5-- why
not have a message that says "you are not experienced
enough to use that" when you try to use
weapons/armor/itmes that are 5-10 levles beyond you?? Just a
thought.<br><br>As far as cross-gender chars-- when I started
playing EQ, i noticed a lack of female characters running
around. I thought i'd roll play a little and create a
female gnome. I love the character and her personality,
but OY VEY!!! EQ attracts a horny crowd!!! haha
<br><br>Anyone else have comments??<br><br>P.S.-- i love the
thought of the uber twinker getting run down by a pawn!!!
